resources.string: Created Book store ( using PHP and DBMS)

Designed and implemented a dynamic online book store using PHP and DBMS, enabling customers to browse, search, order, and securely process payments, resulting in a streamlined and user-friendly shopping experience.
Created Portfolio Website ( using HTML,CSS,Java Script )

Crafted an engaging portfolio website utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing my skills, projects, and achievements, effectively highlighting my expertise and providing an immersive experience for visitors.

independently crafted a customized Android portfolio application using Kotlin within Android Studio. This app serves as a personal showcase, highlighting my projects and abilities for self-reference and doesn\'t intend for professional or client use.

• Position - Assistant Graphic Designer and Video Editor

• Responsibility - Created eye-catching and engaging promotional materials for the Live Law YouTube channel using advanced graphic design skills.

• Achievement - Achieved a 20k subscriber count for the Live Law YouTube channel within a month of joining.

• Responsibility - Created engaging content to drive brand awareness, customer acquisition,and measurable business results using data-driven digital marketing strategies.
